definition: a schematic or preliminary plan, describe roughly or briefly or give the main points or summary of
details:
noun
- a schematic or preliminary plan
= synonyms: schema, scheme
- a sketchy summary of the main points of an argument or theory
= synonyms: abstract
- the line that appears to bound an object
= synonyms: lineation
verb
- describe roughly or briefly or give the main points or summary of
= example: describe roughly or briefly or give the main points or summary of
= synonyms: sketch
- trace the shape of
= synonyms: delineate
- draw up an outline or sketch for something
= synonyms: draft
